2019; Smith et al. 2013; Lee and Lundquist 2017; Takle et al. 2019)

Data from field campaigns suggest that a “suppression of cooling” can explain the observed warming

However, these impacts vary significantly among facilities due to the surrounding land properties and
the area inundated by the reservoir.

emissions from the energy sector be reduced to
